-dark theme without the blue parts

this theme is still being worked on and may have parts that still appear blue!

Style is now being hosted on OpenUserCSS and will no longer be updated here, check the link for new updates: https://openusercss.org/theme/5eb8842c50f7e90c001cebd4

data.name: POWH.io (POWH3D) Dark Exchange Dank-mode
data.description:
This is the POWH3D Dark Exchange Dank-mode Edition for POWH.io Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
PoWH3D is a fiction-made-real blockchain enforced simulation of self-removal from pareto optimality; an economic concept in which there is no longer a way for an allocation of resources to improve without harming a participant of the model. In this case the harm is intentionally self-imposed due to a lack of patience against other opponents, or as an entry fee to start playing the game. —Team JUST

data.name: Flight Rising Checkbox Accessability
data.description:
Enbiggens checkboxes in the hoard and vault for better accessability.

Designed to work with or without Global Fixes:
https://userstyles.org/styles/163291/flight-rising-global-fixes

data.name: Flight Rising Global Fixes
data.description: See this page for info, updates, or requests. Makes the FR website darker, more compact, more accessible, and fixes annoyances. - Darkens the entire site. (Compatible with Zoga's theme, see how below) - Widens the entire site. Many pages have been rearranged to fit the wider theme. - Increases the size of items where shrunk, without compromising the rest of the page. - Create a default text color, font, size, or all three on the forums and profile pages. -Removes unnecessary padding. On most modern monitors: All baldwin recipes, all nests, exalt bonuses on the main page, and the first couple of lines of a dragon's bio should now be visible without scrolling. Adds a reduction cheat sheet to baldwin and an element cheat sheet to the coli.
